column1: Uchi////I didn't get a chance to check out the menu or the pictures on YELP before coming to Uchi
column2: but I had good reviews from all my friends and family. I'm visiting from California
column3: so it will be a while until we will be back in town. Whenever in Houston
column4: I would like to try a few new places since the food is different than in Cali.
